review: Unfortunately, after I purchased this stick, I found out that it can only be used for a TV screen not a laptop.  Like I thought I could connect to my hdmi port on my laptop.  I then tried to connect the stick to my brother-in-laws monitor to active and then received an error code.  Before I send an email for support to Roku, I had already tried the information they provided on the email they sent.It would be nice if on the advertising it would state that the stick is not to be used on a laptop directly and instead state that the stick be connected only to a TV screen for activation and use.
author: alice heydt

review: Good price and quick delivery.  Roko stick works as advertised.  We are still experimenting and figuring it all out.  A little annoying to need to go to a website to sign up for many channels, but I guess that is understandable.  Some of the channel websites are not as easy to navigate as you would hope.  We haven't cut back on cable yet, but I can see how that will be the next step once we get more familiar with what is available here.

review: This device worked great for the first two weeks. There was no lag, no constant buffering, no problem. After that it suddenly began degrading in video quality. I thought it was my router connection, but I have no problems with the connectivity on my phone or laptop, and my house has people frequently accessing the Wi-Fi, but none of them had a problem either. My only guess is that it must be the Roku device itself and I have no idea what would have caused this. I have messed around a bit with my router but to no avail. This roku device now gathers dust on my desk till I can decide what to do with it.
